title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 41.3 - Grant restrictions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 41.3 - Grant restrictions

State Regulations
(a) No
grant shall be made to any one or any consortium of applicants in excess of
$50,000. (b) Grants shall be
disbursed for payment of the cost of services and expenses of the program
director, instructors, faculty and support personnel of the support center, and
any other person providing instruction and counseling in furtherance of the
training program of the support center. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 5
ยง
41.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
